title: Learning Analytics-Based Personalized Intervention Strategies for Large-Scale Programming Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental programming concepts and experience writing simple code
context.additional_context: Program for In-Service Professionals Aimed at Acquiring Programming Skills Applicable to Science-Related Problem-Solving Projects. Features a Digital Device-Supported Environment Enabling Real-Time Learning Analytics and Personalized Feedback

learning_goals: Students can identify and address individual programming comprehension gaps with over 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools
Design intervention strategies to improve team project efficiency by 30% based on learning activity data and code evaluation results
Resolve technical issues occurring during project progress within 24 hours using real-time learning analytics dashboards
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
